summary: ALTERNATOR WENT OUT WITHOUT ANY WARNING. BATTERY WAS DRAINED BY ALTERNATOR HAD NO WARNING. I DRIVE TO WORK AND EVERYTHING WAS FINE HAD NO WARNING LIGHTS ON THAT ANYTHING WAS MALFUNCTIONING IN THE CAR. WHEN I TRIED TO LEAVE WORK I COULDN'T I WAS NOT EVEN ABLE TO GET INTO THE CAR. BOUGHT A NEW BATTERY THE NEXT DAY AND ALTERNATOR DRAINED THAT ONE TOO SO HAD TO GO GET THE ALTERNATOR REPLACED.
